title: If you could describe Shawn Mendes using only one picture, what would it be? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well it is tough to describe someone through a picture(o lot easier than a word)but this is an interesting question.  I’ll chose this pic because it does says a lot about him in just one pic. It shows he is sweet, chilled, humble, loves to sing and really cool. Thanks for the question
This is something that can describe him and his songs
